root: ^Ah, greetings, brave knight! You've come at a dark time for Tiny Kingdom.
^Our peaceful days were shattered when goblins emerged from the depths of the dark caves, bringing terror and chaos to our land. But not all hope is lost.
^To reclaim our peace, you must speak with the Commander, who is stationed near the castle.
^He will guide you on your quest to vanquish the goblins and restore our beloved kingdom. May fortune favor you on your journey. Tiny Kingdom's fate rests in your hands.
